text:
We are looking for participants for an observational #study investigating the safety & efficacy of pharmaceutical-grade #cannabis (1:1 THC 8.93mg/ml and CBD 8.93mg/ml) for the management of #Cancer and #NonCancer related pain. 

Check out https://t.co/SOciEND6H3 for more info https://t.co/XdajopdwVQ
